channel.title: Crash on Surface Tension
channel.description:
I always get a CTD when firing the RPG at the chopper. In my event logs it reads:
Faulting application name: hl2.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x470c11ae Faulting module name: client.dll, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x504ecc4f Exception code: 0xc0000005 Fault offset: 0x00362edd Faulting process id: 0xcf8 Faulting application start time: 0x01cd940d22dd7064 Faulting application path: c:\steam\steamapps\lister8\source sdk base 2007\hl2.exe Faulting module path: c:\steam\steamapps\sourcemods\bms\bin\client.dll Report Id: 114eda50-0001-11e2-baff-f46d04af08c0

item.title: Crash on Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: 1Lister_of_Smeg
item.description:
